review_text: We bought this product a couple weeks ago for my mom who suffers from fibromyalgia. Within a few weeks, she noticed a significant reduction in muscle pain and fatigue. She finds it very soothing and says it allows her to sleep better at night. As someone who's tried many fibromyalgia treatments, she's thankful to have found something natural like this that improves her condition. It's been very helpful for her.
I find this is a good form of magnesium to be taken after dinner.  I think the herbs and other ingredients included in this help with relaxing and sleeping.
bought for Mom. helps with sleep and depression. ingredients were similar to other overcounter drug, but this one is worthe the price. Quality of the products is great.
This is a great combo of ingredients!  Magnesium for muscle aches and malic acid for energy! Love it for FMS!

review_title: Has really helped with fibromyalgia stiffness
review_text: I've taken this product for 15 years and recommend it to reduce muscle stiffness associated with fibromyalgia. 3 capsules/day as well as Thorne Brand 5-HTP (3 caps/day) is very helpful.
Recommended by health store own for fibromyalgia. The Malic Acid/Magnesium along with other products and exercise keep my fibromyalgia in check as long as I avoid sugar and don't workout too hard.
